snippet: Division I’s longest active winning streak ended at 18 as Albany defeated the Seawolves, who twice have had their N.C.A.A. tournament hopes dashed by the Great Danes.
abstract: Albany defeats Stony Brook, 82-70, breaking Seawolves' 18-game winning streak.
lead_paragraph: Division I’s longest active winning streak ended at 18 as Albany defeated the Seawolves, who twice have had their N.C.A.A. tournament hopes dashed by the Great Danes.

headline.print_headline: Albany Again Has Stony Brook’s Number as Winning Streak Ends at 18
headline.main: Albany Again Has Stony Brook’s Number as Winning Streak Ends at 18
